summary.span: 提供一个基类，要用作证据的所有对象都必须派生自该类。

span.span: Provides a base class from which all objects to be used as evidence must derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，几乎所有对象都用作证据对象，如果希望将它应用作为证据的托管代码。Before the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], almost any object could be used as an evidence object if the hosting code wanted to apply it as evidence. 例如，某些.NET Framework 代码识别作为证据的对象。For example, some .NET Framework code recognized objects as evidence. 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 将证据对象视为引用，并且未对其应用任何类型的安全。The common language runtime (CLR) considered evidence objects as references, and did not apply any type safety to them. 由于没有在其类型可以使用作为证据对象的隐式限制，这会显示问题。This presented a problem because there were implicit restrictions on which types could be used as evidence objects. 具体而言，任何作为证据的对象必须是可序列化，并且不能`null`。Specifically, any object used as evidence had to be serializable and could not be `null`. 如果不满足这些要求，CLR 将已执行所需的这些假设一个操作时引发了异常。If these requirements were not met, the CLR threw an exception whenever an operation that required one of these assumptions was performed. 中引入了类，该类的所有证据对象必须都派生自，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]启用约束可用作证据的对象的类型并提供的功能添加到所有证据的新功能和要求对象。The class, which all evidence objects must derive from, was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] to enable constraints on the types of objects that can be used as evidence and to provide the ability to add new features and requirements to all evidence objects. 类确保证据对象是可序列化时实例化。The class ensures, upon instantiation, that the evidence object is serializable. 此外，它使新的证据要求创建通过将新的默认实现添加到类的基类。In addition, it enables new evidence requirements to be created by adding new default implementations to the base class. 由 CLR，因为在进行了更新证据对象的所有类型[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]为派生。All the types used by the CLR as evidence objects have been updated in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] to derive from .
